channel.title: Interview on wd and cc
channel.description: Recent content in Interview on wd and cc

item.title: Interview Is a Two Way Choise
item.description: 最近看到一些人贴面试经历，我觉得可以适当总结一下，结论是：面试就是一个双向选择，对方不选你不一定是因

item.title: Some Interview Questions
item.description: Notes for some interview questions. OSI 7 layers Physical layer. Data link layer. Switches are working on this layer, so when we talk about mac address, node to node connection, it's all happened here. Network layer. IP/ICMP protocol are for this layer. IP address, router, routing to other routers hanppend at this layer.

item.title: 关于面试的一点经验
item.description: 最近面试了不少，也算有点经验了，阶段总结一下。本文也基本是针对刚毕业的或者毕业没两年的，大牛就别看了
